cppc.compiler.exec

Class ChenDriver

  • java.lang.Object
    • cetus.exec.Driver
      • cppc.compiler.exec.ChenDriver

  • public class ChenDriver
extends Driver
    chenDriver implements the command line parser and controls pass ordering. Users may extend this class by overriding runPasses (which provides a default sequence of passes). The derived class should pass an instance of itself to the run method. Derived classes have access to a protected Program object.
